title: I Gamed With THIS for a MONTH – Azeron Cyborg

media:group.media:title: I Gamed With THIS for a MONTH – Azeron Cyborg
media:group.media:description:
Join us in War Thunder for FREE at https://playwt.link/joinltt Get an exclusive bonus using our link - thanks for supporting the channel!

Plouffe was voluntold to daily drive the Azeron Cyborg for at least a MONTH. It definitely has a wide range of benefits, but do they outweigh the cons and annoyances? Is this the controller or gamepad replacement you've been looking for?

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1462872-i-gamed-with-this-for-a-month-%E2%80%93-azeron-cyborg/
